short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension to help you build your dealflow

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension of NorthStar to help you analyze any startups more easily. Came across the website of a startup that you find interesting? Use the extension to immediately generate an analysis to your NorthStar Dealflow
